What exactly is SaveMyForm?: For frontend-only applications if the developer wants to collect form submissions from his/her users, he/she requires to create a complete backend application for it. It Solves the problem by providing the developers a url which they can use for form submissions by sending a POST request to the url.
Does it have reCaptcha Support?: Yes, SaveMyForm does offers reCaptcha Support which ensures your data and website is well protected from spam and bots.
Is SaveMyForm free to use?: Yes, all of our services that we offer, are free-to-use.
